document_data.name: Sirian
document_data.mainbody: '''Sirian''' was one of the male [[drow]], led by the High Priestess of [[Lolth]], Azurna in the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: In [[1370 DR]], Azurna was following the will of her goddess to uncover the lost ''[[Flame Sword of Lolth]]'' in [[Undermountain]] and conspiring against [[Waterdeep]]. Azurna's drow forces established multiple bases and strongholds in [[Halaster Blackcloak]]'s mega-dungeon. Sirian was stationed in one of the deeper strongholds and was entrusted with the keys of the base by two higher-ups who were romantically involved with each other.
